title: F Marry Kill
overview: When true-crime junkie Eva Vaugh is shoved into the dating app world by her besties on her 30th birthday, she suddenly finds herself at the center of a real-life murder case. As new details about the murders are revealed on her favorite podcast, she realizes that one of the three men sheâ€™s dating could be the infamous "Swipe Right Killer" terrorizing the city.
